metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000487 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Plexus-utils before 3.0.16 is vulnerable to command injection because itdoes not correctly process the contents of double quoted strings.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libplexus-utils-java - 1:1.5.15-4+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

libplexus-utils2-java - 3.0.22-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: plexus-utils package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.5.15-4+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
plexus-utils2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.22-1').
